ygData.subject: Crude Stein Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Spoiler Below ... / Crude Stiens are plain old loot items from Ogre Bouncers.  You can usually obtain one by heading down there and looking for high level
ygData.messageBody:
Jenni wrote:

> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> So far I've only used it on the Fire Elementals in Lavastorm, I haven't done a
> lot of experementation with it.
>
> I'm working on getting more CHR items as well, being DE I didn't get a very high
> base CHR. I think without the gear I have so far my CHR is only 80. :( the CHR
> buff I get later will help that.
>
> Another CHR question. I was lucky enough to find a crude stein for sale on a
> merchant in Feerot, only cost me 7pp and some change. It's not for sale there
> anymore. I've heard the only way you're supposed to be able to get one is
> through a quest. Does anyone know what quest gives the crude stein? I see
> people auctioning them occasionally for 30 to 70pp. I could use the money, so I
> wouldn't mind running the quest to get another one. (too bad they're lore and
> can only be held in the secondary hand. There's been times that carrying 2 of
> them would have come in very handy.)

Spoiler Below
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
\/

Crude Stiens are plain old loot items from Ogre Bouncers. You can usually obtain
one by heading down there and looking for high level players who kite the guards.
Since they are lore, you can probably get one for free.
